name: MistySounds
0:
”Alexa open Misty Sounds”
”Alexa ask Misty Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: misty sounds
des:
Captures the mysterious and calming essence of a mist-covered landscape. Expect to hear soft, ethereal sounds that evoke a sense of tranquility and mystique, perfect for relaxation or meditation.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Misty Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
